She began with one table and one chair, selling food to her acquaintances and neighbors, but as the demand for her food increased she decided to buy more tables and locate her business in a shop. As a result of that good decision she now works with one of her daughters from morning to evening making dishes such as "Yapingachos," (stuffed potato patties) "guatita," (beef stew) etc. In order to be able to continue her business she needs to buy more supplies such as rice, meat, and drinks. In the future she wants to expand her business and have multiple restaurant locations.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Richardson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of rice, meat, and drinks

loans.name: Tajy Poty Group

texts.es:
En Yaguarón, se reunieron unas mujeres con el objetivo de  aumentar su capital de trabajo y para emprender actividades productivas, de ahí que coordinaron la reunión para interiorizarse sobre el programa, a quienes les pareció interesante por ser una  oportunidad crediticia muy buena.
El comité lleva por nombre Tajy Poty actualmente se encuentran en el segundo ciclo, integrada por 18  luchadoras señoras, quienes se esmeran días tras días para aumentar sus ingresos y por ende brindarle lo mejor a sus respectivas familias. Todas las integrantes son muy trabajadoras, quienes han invertido sus préstamos en sus respectivas actividades.
Una de ellas es la integrantes es la señora Juana quien tiene como actividad para generar ingresos un negocio donde vende artículos generales para la casa.
Ella tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad por la antigüedad de su negocio y mediante una buena administración va creciendo y actualmente tiene gran cantidad de cliente.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra enlatados, artículos de limpieza, ferretería, librería, farmacia.
texts.en:
In Yaguarón some women got together with the goal of increasing their working capital and undertaking business activities. They went on to plan a meeting in order to learn more about the loan program, as it seemed interesting and a good opportunity for obtaining credit. The committee is called Tajy Poty and is currently in its second cycle. Its members comprise 18 dedicated women who outdo themselves day after day to increase their earnings and thus offer the best to their respective families. All the members are very hardworking and have invested their loan monies in their respective businesses. One of the members is Juana who has as her business the sale of general items for the home. She has a lot of experience due to the length of time she has had the business. Through her good management her business is growing and she now has a large customer base. The loan is requested for purchasing canned goods, cleaning supplies, hardware items, books and pharmaceuticals.

Translated from Spanish by Margaret Wolfe-Roberts, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase canned goods, cleaning supplies, hardware items, books, pharmaceuticals, fresh produce and flour for retail sale

loans.name: Bosco Feliciano

texts.es:
Bosco de 51 años, vive en las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas), el da el servicio de transporte de puerta a puerta. 

El se fue a Estados Unidos a trabajar y tener mas posibilidades económicas pero como sus hijos crecían sin la guía de su padre, el decidió regresar a Ecuador y trabajar como chofer. Poco a poco con esfuerzo el continuo con su trabajo de chofer aunque ya separado de su esposa pero dedicándole aun mas tiempo a sus hijos. 

No ha tenido el dinero necesario para construir mejo su casa por eso con el crédito quiere comprar cemento, bloques y cables, en el futuro quiere tener un taller de reparación de cocinas y alquilarlas.
texts.en:
Bosco is 51 and lives in Las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (an urban area that is called "The Orchids" because when it was discovered, there were many orchids here). He offers a door-to-door transportation service. He went to the United States to work and to have more economic opportunities, but as his children were growing up without the guidance of their father, he decided to return to Ecuador and work as a chauffeur. Little by little, and with effort, he continued his work as a chauffeur even though he was separated from his wife and was dedicating even more time to his children. He hasn't had the money he needs to build a home. This is why he will use this loan to buy cement, bricks, and cables. In the future, he hopes to have a repair shop for stoves and also rent them out.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Cement, bricks, and cables

loans.name: Emanuel Ita

texts.en:
Emanuel Ita N. is 27 years old. He is a farmer and supports three people in his family. His spouse is Norkilorit N. and they have two children aged 5 years and 2 years. Norkilorit is a housewife and she helps Emanuel in his farming activity.

Emanuel does wheat farming which he has been doing for the last three years successfully. This will be his first loan and he is planning to spend it on preparing his five acre farm for wheat planting. He is planning to use the anticipated profit from his farming to expand his farming activity by hiring a bigger piece of land to increase his wheat production.

He hopes to become a large scale farmer owning a bigger piece of land and be financially stable to support his family.

loans.use: preparing a farm for wheat planting

loans.name: Ngai Yeyo Ole

texts.en:
Ngai Yeyo Ole S. is a 58-year-old gentleman who is married to Tiamalel S. and a father of five children. Ngai Yeyo is a farmer and he does the farming on his own piece of land which he has been doing for the last twenty years.

He learned about KADET from other members in a group already registered with KADET in his area of residence. This will be second loan which he is planning to use to buy fertilizer and chemicals for his maize farm. Maize has been doing well in his area due to good climatic conditions. He hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand his farming activity from small scale to commercial farming.

Ngai Yeyo's dream is do large scale farming and start a sheep rearing project. He is a hard-working man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: fertilizer and chemicals for a maize farm

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 35 años, vive con su esposo en casa de su madre. Hace más de 6 años tiene una tienda, que se encuentra instalada en su casa, donde atiende todos los días, además su madre y su hermana la ayudan en el negocio. Además de vender productos de primera necesidad vende también remedios, objetos para regalo, golosinas  y útiles de escritorio, de esa manera amplia su mercado y complace además con la necesidad del cliente, sin necesidad de ir a la ciudad de conseguir alguno de éstos productos que ofrece. Durante este  tiempo ha visto la ventaja de tener un negocio propio porque tiene mayor afluencia de clientes y eso es la clave de su éxito, adicionalmente la buena atención que da a sus clientes también ayuda a mantener sus clientes. Por tal motivo desea abastecerse de mercadería, así como ampliar su tienda  para atraer a más clientela. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, utilizará en la compra de productos, golosinas y gaseosas.
texts.en:
Carmen is 35 years old and lives with her husband in her mother's home. She has been running a store from her home for more than 6 years. Her mother and sister also help her with the store. In addition to selling basic necessity items, she also sells medicine, gift items, candy and stationary. This has helped to broaden her market and meet her customers needs without having to go to the city to obtain any of the products that she offers. The experience of having her own business has made her realize its advantages because she has an abundance of customers and this is the key to success. Also, the good service that she gives her customers helps to maintain her clientele. For this reason she want to stock more merchandise in her store in order to attract more customers. This is her second loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support as a result of always being very responsible with her payments. She is grateful to be a part of her communal bank because all the members are very responsible and there is solidarity among them. She is also grateful to the people who will make this loan possible as it will be very useful to the growth of her business. She will use the loan that she is requesting to buy candy, soda and other products.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Achilli, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Naiputa Ene

texts.en:
Naiputa Ene Y. is 45 years old and her spouse is Kiotat Y.. She supports two members of her family. Her spouse is also a farmer and they have been practicing cash crop farming for the last ten years.

This will be her first loan, which she is planning to spend on seeds, fertilizer and chemicals to spray wheat, and planting wheat. With the anticipated profits from the expanded business, she is planning to increase her farm produce by ploughing more acres and also educating her children. She also hopes to repay her loan successfully without default.

Her hopes and dreams are to expand her farming activity from small scale to large scale and also see her children get to a better school with good learning facilities.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizer and chemicals to spray wheat, and to plant wheat.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
El Sr .Maximo  es casado con 3 hijos ya mayores ,se dedica a la panadería  , que esta ubicado en su domicilio.  
 Don Maximo ya tiene una clientela ya formada , ya hace 6 años que se  dedica  a esta actividad.
 El Sr.  trabajaba en un panadería de un primo y con un poco de capital , se independizo .
El crédito será de ayuda para poder comprar un vehículo ya que le sera muy útil para el reparto de sus productos.
 En el futuro desea  ampliar su negocio y dar mas trabajo a la comunidad .
texts.en:
Maximo is married with three older children. He works in a bakery located in his home. Maximo already has an established clientele from having worked in this line of business for six years. He originally worked in a cousin's bakery and, with a little capital, was able to become independent. This loan will help to buy a vehicle, which will be very useful for distributing his products. In the future he wants to expand his business and provide more jobs for the community.

Translated from Spanish by Kara Gibson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a vehicle.

loans.name: Marleny Del Rocio

texts.es:
Marleny de 39 años, vive en las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas), ella tiene una papelería.  

Para ayudar con los gastos familiares de su esposo y poder pasar tiempo con sus dos hijos comenzó a vender cuadernos, plumas y papeleria en su casa a sus vecinos, construyo la parte delantera de su casa en un local. Con la ayuda de su esposo ahora ella tiene una tienda y están mejor económicamente. 

Pero para continuar trabajando en su negocio ella necesita comprar con el préstamo una vitrina y papelería. En el futuro quiere readecuar mejor su casa y comprar un carro.
texts.en:
39-year-old Marleny lives in the urban zone Orquídeas de Guayaquil, named "the orchids" due to the discovery of many orchid flowers in that locale. She owns a stationery store. To help with her spouse's daily expenses and to be able to spend time with her two children, she began to sell notebooks, pens and stationery from her home to her neighbors. The front part of the house was built in a storefront. With her husband's help, she now has a shop and they are better off financially. To continue working in this business, Marleny needs to buy a cabinet and stationery with this loan. In the future she would like to renovate their house and to buy a car.

Translated from Spanish by Kara Gibson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cabinets and stationery.

loans.name: Lorena Marianela

texts.es:
Lorena de 35 años, vive en las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas), ella tiene una tienda de víveres. 

Lorena cuando quedo viuda tuvo que buscar un trabajo en donde pudiera pasar tiempo con su hijo, y ganar dinero sin depender de un empleador, decidió invertir sus ahorros en víveres para vender. Desde ese tiempo trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm todos los días vende arroz, azúcar, bebidas, caramelos.  

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, aceite y azúcar para su tienda de víveres, en el futuro quiere tener la tienda mas surtida y tener una papelería.
texts.en:
Lorena, age 35, lives in las Orquideas de Guayaquil (an urban zone, named "las Orquideas ["The Orchids]" because when it was discovered there were many orchids). She has a grocery store. When Lorena was widowed she had to find a work where she could spend time with her child and earn money without depending on an employer. She decided to invest her savings in groceries to sell. Since then, she works from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm every day selling rice, sugar, drinks and candy. With this loan she wants to buy rice, oil and sugar for her grocery store. In the future she wants her store to be better stocked and to have a stationery store.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: rice, oil, sugar

loans.name: Mujeres Esorzadas Group

texts.es:
El Mujeres Esforzadas está conformada por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras quienes iniciaron con dinero propio sus pequeños negocios los cuales desean mejorar es por ello que solicitan este primer crédito. La coordinadora del grupo es Patrona del Carmen Jirón quien inicio hace siete años realizando tortillas, frijoles cocidos y cuajadas actualmente tiene una pequeña pulpería. Ella con el préstamo comprara arros, frijoles, aceite, leña, maíz y cuajada.

Las otras integrantes del grupo son Reyna Isabel M. L. quien desde hace 9 años vende películas, nacatamales, gaseosa y frescos, y María Isabel L. M. comercializa desde 11 años  CD y  películas.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Esforzadas group is made up of three hardworking and strong women who started their small businesses with their own money. They want to improve the businesses and this is why they are requesting their first loan. The coordinator of the group is Patrona del Carmen Jirón who began seven years ago making tortillas, cooked beans and cheese and she currently has a small grocery store. With this loan she will buy rice, beans, oil, firewood, corn and cheese. The other members of the group are Reyna Isabel M. L. who 9 years ago started selling movies, nacatamales (Nicaraguan tamales) soft drinks and juices, and Maria Isabel L. M. who 11 years ago began selling CDs and movies.

Translated from Spanish by Miriam Palacio, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, oil, firewood, corn and cheese

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Build a room

loans.name: Lipcia Carolina

texts.es: Lipcia Carolina tiene 36 años, por lo que su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general, por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos por lo que ya tiene cierta experiencia. Tiene 1 hijo a su cargo ella se responsabiliza por proporcionarle los estudios alimentos y vestimenta diariamente. Ella se levanta temprano a las 6 de la mañana y cierra  su tienda a las 7 de la noche, por lo que siempre está pendiente de los que sus clientes le solicitan, hace más de 6 años que se dedica a este negocio. El financiamiento es para perfumes, ropa interior,  colonias, tratamientos, sabanas, calzado y ropa en general. Siempre está pensando en su negocio pero le gustaría establecer una pulpería.
texts.en:
Lipcia Carolina is 36 years old and sells general merchandise. This is not the first time she has received a loan since she already has proven experience. Lipcia has a dependent child for whom she is responsible in providing the daily needs of food, clothing, and an education. She wakes up early at 6am and closes her store at 7pm. Lipcia has been in business for more than six years and is always aware of what her customers are requesting.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, undergarments, colognes, treatments, linens, shoes, and clothing. She is always thinking about her business and would like to open a grocery store.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase perfumes, undergarments, colognes, treatments, linens, shoes, and clothing

loans.name: Devora Group

texts.es:
El grupo Devora está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Rosa Argentina L. Gonzales, coordinadora del grupo quien comercializa zapatos desde hace cuatro años y quien su ella con tener un tramos de calzado. 
Las otras dos integrantes son Yareth L. Delgado tiene un puesto de repuesto de bicicleta en el mercadito y María Cristina L. comercializa bisutería desde hace 4 años. Ellas iniciaron estos negocios con su esfuerzo y desean que progresen por ello solicitan este primer crédito.
texts.en:
The Devora Group consists of three hardworking, determined, and enterprising women. One of them is Rosa Argentina L. Gonzales, the group coordinator, who has been selling shoes for four years. She has a vending space where she sells shoes.

The other two members are Yareth L. Delgado, who has a small bicycle parts shop at the market, and María Cristina L., who has been selling costume jewelry for four years. They started their businesses as a result of their own efforts and want to keep progressing. This is their first loan request.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase shoes

loans.name: Luis Francisco

texts.es:
Luis Francisco de 23 años de edad, es soltero, habita en casa de sus padres, a quienes ayuda con los gastos familiares, se desempeña como director de la Escuela de Santa Fe desde hace 3 años.  

Esta solictando  su 2do credito con el fin de consruir una cocina  ya que la que tiene se encuentra en mal estado, cuenta con una parte del dinero, sin embargo para terminarla le hace falta el financiamiento que solicita. Se caracteriza por ser un cliente bien responsable con sus compromisos.

Su mayor sueño en la vida es seguir estudiando, tener salud y estabilidad laboral para asi seguir ayudando a sus padres y poder cumplir con todos sus sueños en el futuro.
texts.en:
Luis Francisco is 23 years old and single. He lives in the home of his parents, whom he helps with the household expenses. He has worked for the past 3 years as a school director in Santa Fe. He is requesting his second loan with the aim of building a kitchen, since the current one is in bad shape. He has some of the money already, but to finish it he needs the funds from the loan he is requesting. He has shown himself to be a client who is very responsible with his commitments. His greatest dream in life is to keep studying, maintain his health and keep a steady job, so that he can keep helping his parents and fulfill all of his dreams in the future.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Building a kitchen

loans.name: Yolidia Esther

texts.es:
Yolidia tiene 27 años de edad, trabaja como docente de primaria desde hace 9 años en la Escuela Rubèn Dario en la zona # 5 de Nueva Guinea, es madre soltera de una niña de 8 añitos de edad la cual estudia su tercer grado de primaria en la misma escuela donde ella labora.  

Esta solicitando refinanciamiento de su 7mo credito con el objetivo de comprar materiales de construccion  para asi poco a poco ir construyendo una cocina que mucha falta le hace, pues actualmente la tiene en la sala.  

Yolidia es una mujer muy responsable, honesta y muy trabajadora, actualmente ella està cursando su quinto año en la Universidad en la carrera de Psicologia Clinica en la Universidad Martin Lutero, su mayor sueños en la vida es tener estabilidad laboral y que su hija estudie para que en el futuro sea persona de bien.
texts.en:
Yolidia is 27 years old and has worked for 9 years as a primary school teacher at the Rubèn Dario School in zone # 5 of Nueva Guinea. She is the single mother of an 8-year-old daughter, who is now in the third grade at the same school where Yolidia works. She is requesting refinancing of her 7th loan, with the aim of buying construction materials so she can gradually build a kitchen, which her household needs badly, since they are currently cooking in the living room. Yolidia is a very responsible, honest and hard-working woman. She is currently in her fifth year at the university, studying Clinical Psychology at the Martin Luther University. Her greatest dreams in life are to have a stable job situation and to see her daughter attend the university so she can be successful when she grows up.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying construction materials for a kitchen

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
El comité Santa Lucia nace hace más de dos años mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar.
Este comité en estos dos años de intenso trabajo han crecido tanto social como económicamente, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Mirian quien se dedica a la venta de frutas en su casa en una casilla que tiene.
Ella ademas recorre por el barrio para vender sus frutas, a los negocios y otros.
La actividad le ayuda y para ella es muy importante para la alimentacion de su familia.
Ella es esta oportunidad solicita el prestamo para la compra de mas frutas como naranjas, manznas, frutillas, peras, platanos y otros.
texts.en:
The Santa Lucia Committee was started more than two years ago with the help of another committee that works in the same area. During this time, the members have grown socially as well as financially. They are known in their area for being hardworking women.

One of the members is Sra. Mirian who sells fruit from a booth near her home. She also travels around the neighborhood selling fruits to businesses and other people. This activity is very important since it helps to feed her family. Mirian is taking this opportunity to request a loan so that she can buy more fruits such as oranges, apples, strawberries, pears, bananas, and other products.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase oranges, apples, strawberries, pears, bananas, and other products

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago de 30 años de edad es casado, labora para el MINED desde hace 12 años como docente de secundaria, su esposa se encarga de los quehaceres del hogar y del cuido de su hijo de 7 añitos de edad.  

Esta solicitando financiamiento de su 1er credito con el cual pretende construir una habitacion con mejores condiciones para su familia.  Santiago es un joven con alto espiritu de superacion, pues actualmente esta estudiando 4to año en la carrera de docencia universitaria y conforme pasen los años  y si esta en sus manos piensa estudiar una maestria. 

Su mayor sueño es tener una casita con las condiciones basicas para que su familia se sienta comoda.
texts.en:
Santiago is 30 years of age, married, and has worked for the MINED (Ministry of Education) for 12 years as a teacher in secondary school. His wife is in charge of household matters and the care of their 7-year-old son. Santiago is making his 1st loan request and hopes to construct a better house for his family. He is a young man with an elevated desire to get ahead. He is presently studying in his 4th year at the university towards a teaching career. If it were in his hands, Santiago would like to study for the masters degree. His fondest dream is to have a little house with all the basic conditions so that his family could feel comfortable.

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: BUILDING A BETTER HOUSE FOR HIS FAMILY

loans.name: Jorge Remigio

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 45 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a sus padre y hermanos en el caserío Las Delicias, un centro poblado del área rural del distrito de Oyotún, un distrito agrícola situado a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas desde hace mas de diez años, el cuenta con un terreno agrícola en donde suele sembrar arroz, la zona de Oyotún cuenta con terrenos bastante propicios para sembrar este producto debido a la abundancia de recurso hídrico en la zona. Al igual que la mayoría de agricultores de la zona,  Jorge se dedica a sembrar este producto dos veces por año y depende de esta actividad para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Jorge ha instalado una hectárea de arroz y desea valerse de este cultivo para sacar adelante a su familia, el está trabajando arduamente todos los dias para poder conseguir este propósito, actualmente desea aplicar a su cultivo diversos abonos para garantizarse una buena prducción, para lograr su objetivo ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Jorge es una persona bastante trabajdora y que gusta mucho de la labor que realiza, su mayor anhelo es seguir adelante y poder obtener siempre buenas cosechas que garanticen el bienestar de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
Jorge is 45 years old, single, and lives with his father and siblings in the village of Las Delicias, a rural area in the central part of the district of Oyotún, which is two hours away from the city of Chiclayo.

Jorge has been farming for more than ten years. He has enough farmland in the Oyotún area that is sufficient for producing rice because of the abundance of water in the area. Like most farmers in the area, Jorge grows rice twice a year and depends on this activity for meeting his family expenses.

Jorge has a hectare of land for growing rice and wants to continue producing this crop so that his family can get ahead. He works hard every day so that he can continue in this manner. Jorge wants to apply different types of fertilizer in order to guarantee a good production. To achieve this goal, he is requesting his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN.

Jorge is a hardworking person who enjoys what he does for a living. His greatest wish is to move forward and be able to achieve good harvests so that he can guarantee the welfare of his loved ones.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizers for his rice crop

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 30 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 10 años se dedica a elaborar ladrillos en una fábrica. Su estilo de trabajo es de manera dependiente, ya que gracias a una amistad de su esposo logró entrar en dicha fábrica, desde entonces elabora ella misma los ladrillos que luego serán vendidos al por mayor. Pero ella vio que la mejor ventaja es comprar los ladrillos que elabora y llevarlas a diversas ciudades para venderlas a un mayor precio. Actualmente trabaja medio tiempo y eso le permite dedicarse a sus hijos. Considera que esta actividad le ha unido más a su familia, recibe el apoyo de ellos ya sea elaborando o vendiéndolos, por eso se siente muy satisfecha por esto. En adelante desea tener su propio terreno para instalar su fábrica y producir ladrillos en mayor cantidad. Este es su noveno crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su grupo comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece además aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, utilizará en la compra de ladrillos al por mayor.
texts.en:
Elena, age 30, lives in her own house with her husband and their two children. For over ten years she has been making bricks in a factory. She is an employee thanks to her husband’s friend who was able to get her into the factory. From that time on she has made bricks, which are later sold wholesale. However, she saw that the advantageous thing to do is to buy the bricks that she makes. Then, she takes them to different cities to sell them for a better price. She currently works half time, which allows her to devote herself to her children. She thinks that this activity has united her family more. She receives help from them in making and selling the bricks. She is very pleased about this. Later she wishes to have her own land to establish a factory to produce a greater quantity of bricks. This is her ninth loan with MFP. She is very happy knowing that she has financial support. She has always demonstrated herself to be responsible with her payments. It pleases her to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people. Also, she is grateful to the people who will make the loan she is requesting possible. It will be very useful to the progress of her business. She will use the loan she is requesting to buy bricks wholesale.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more bricks

loans.name: Medarda Lorena

texts.es:
Doña Medarda de 36 años de edad,  es soltera, tiene 2 hijos el mayor de 16 años el cual estudia por encuentro la secundaria ya que en el lugar donde vive no secundaria regular y la niña menor de 12 años de edad  estudia su sexto grado de primaria, labora como docente para el Ministerio de Educacion desde hace 6 años en el Nerpe Francisco Aaron Joce, ubicada en la colonia Naciones Unidas ubicada a 32 kilometros de Nueva Guinea. 

Està solicitando su primer credito para comprar  zinc para su vivienda, para cambiarlo, ya que el que tiene esta en mal estado y con las lluvias se le moja la casa.  

Su mayor sueño en la vida de Medarda es ver a sus hijos profesionales de bien y tener su casita con las condiciones necesarias que sus hijos se merecen.
texts.en:
Doña Medarda is 36 years old, single, and has two children. Her 16 year old son attends high school elsewhere since the place where they live does not have a regular high school. Meanwhile, her 12 year old daughter is in sixth grade. Medarda has been working six years as a teacher for the Ministry of Education at the Nerpe Francisco Aaron Joce School in the Naciones Unidas subdivision, which is located 32km from Nueva Guinea.

She is requesting her first loan to buy sheets of zinc for her home to replace the existing ones that are in bad condition and causing moisture to seep into her house.

Her greatest wish in life is to see her children become successful professionals and have a house with the conditions that they deserve.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sheets of zinc to repair her roof

loans.name: German Abrahan

texts.es:
German de 56 años, vive en las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas), el vende legumbres en un triciclo recorriendo las Orquídeas. 

El fue comerciante informal en la antigua “PPG” (mercado mayorista y minorista de Guayaquil), pero como necesitaba mas dinero decidió trabajar en un triciclo vendiendo verduras por el sector donde vive, ahora trabaja desde las 04h00am hasta el atardecer.  

El quiere incrementar sus ganancias poniendo a una persona a trabajar por eso el préstamo lo quiere utilizar para comprar un triciclo y verduras, en el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
German is 56 years old and lives in Orquídeas de Guayaquil (an urban area that is named after the many orchids that existed when the place was discovered). He sells legumes out of a tricycle that he uses to move around Orquídeas.

He previously worked as an informal merchant at the old “PPG” (a wholesale and retail market in Guayaquil). However, he needed more money so he decided to work from a tricycle and sell vegetables around the area where he lives. German now works from 4am until sunset.

He wants to increase his earnings by putting another person to work. For this reason, he will use this loan to buy another tricycle and vegetables. In the future, German wants to finish the construction of his house.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase another tricycle & vegetables to sell

loans.name: Claudia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Claudia tiene 30 años D. edad resiD. en El municipio D. San Rafael D. Oriente, Departamento D. San Miguel, es casada, vive con el esposo y tienen una hija D. 2 años D. edad, ella tiene un negocio donD. venD. productos D. primera necesidad “ Tienda “.
El negocio lo realizo por iniciativa propia, el esposo la apoya, no tiene horario definido y sus clientes son los vecinos y personas que circulan por la zona, ella necesita el préstamo para compra D. productos como son: leche en polvo, azúcar, frijoles, aceite , arroz y otros productos D. primera necesidad que los cliente demandan.
El sueño D. Claudia es mantener el negocio y prepararse procesionalmente ya que el esposo actualmente estudia enfermería, y ella le gustaría también especializarse en esta misma carrera.
texts.en:
Claudia is 30 years old, married, and lives in the municipality of San Rafael D. Oriente, Department of San Miguel, with her husband and their 2 year old daughter. She iniciated the business, called "Shop", which sells necessities. She is supported by her husband, has no set schedule, and her customers are neighbors and people traveling around the town. She is requesting a loan to purchase products such as powdered milk, sugar, beans, oil, rice, and other products that the customers ask for. Claudia's dream is to maintain her business and as her husband is studying to become a nurse, prepare herself professionally for the same career.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Reynolds, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase products such as powdered milk, sugar, beans, oil, rice

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jacoba

texts.es:
Doña Jacoba de 46 años de edad es casada,  habita en la colonia el verdun a 5 km de Nueva Guinea, tiene una hija a cargo de 11 añitos de edad estudiando la primaria.  Actualmente labora para el MINED como docente de primaria  desde hace 12 años, desempeñado su trabajo con gran responsabilidad y honestidad. 

Esta solicitando su 8vo credito con el objetivo de construir una habitacion y asi tener mejor comodidad y privacidad en su hogar.  

El mayor sueño que tiene es poder darle a su familia las condiciones necesarias en el hogar.
texts.en:
Jacoba is 46 years old, married, and lives in the Verdun colony, 5 km from New Guinea, with her 11 year old daughter who is in primary school. For 12 years now, she has worked for MINED as a primary school teacher, performing her duties with great responsibility and honesty. She is requesting her 8th loan with the goal of constructing a room to have better comfort and privacy in her home. Her biggest dream is to be able to give her family the necessities at home.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Reynolds, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Ángela María

texts.es:
La señora Ángela María G. R., tiene la edad de 37 años vive en Pilas Orientales, es casada y su esposo es comerciante apoyándole en el gasto en el que se incurre mensualmente, son una familia de 4 hijos, el mayor le apoya en los trabajos del campo y los demás apoyan a las actividades del hogar, así mismo estudian el colegio, ellos se dedican a la agricultura de granos Básicos, desde hace mas de 12 años, y fue gracias al apoyo de su esposo que logro comprar y expandir los terrenos del cultivo.

Ahora para hacer mejoras a sus terrenos, solicitan un préstamo para la compra de matariles agrícolas e insumos  vegetativos que permitan un mejor mantenimiento a su arado y mejore la producción. A futuro esto le mejorara el volumen en las ventas y la economía del hogar, favoreciendo en la incursión de nuevas fuentes de trabajo e ingresos para la mejora a los niveles socio-económicos que en la actualidad llevan.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ángela María G. R. is 37 years old, married, and lives in Pilas Orientales with her husband, a merchant, who supports her with the monthly expenses. They are a family of 4, with the oldest working with them in the field and the others doing the household chores. They are in school and also devoted to basic farming, as they have been for 12 years, thanks to her husband who purchased more land to cultivate. Now, in order to make improvements to this land, they are requesting a loan to purchase agricultural materials to better maintain the land and improve production. In the future, this will increase their sales and household income by providing new sources of work and income to improve their socio-economic level.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Reynolds, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase agricultural materials to better maintain the land and improve production

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo es un padre de familia de 47 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive junto a su familia en el caserío Macuaco, un centro poblado que pertenece a la zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, un distrito agrícola que se encuentra a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica al comercio de animales desde hace mas de quince años, el compra y cría animales para luego ofrecerlos en venta a los negociantes que visitan la zona y a su vez venderlos en una feria ganadera que toma lugar una vez por semana en el distrito de Cayaltí. El se vale de estos ingresos para solventar la economía familiar.

Eduardo desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas animales para ampliar su negocio y aumentar su nivel de ventas, por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

El es una persona activa y emprendedora, su mayor anhelo es aumentar su negocio gradualmente para poder ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, en la zona donde vive el bastante conocido y respetado por sus vecinos y amigos.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a 47 year old father with two children. He lives with his family in the village of Macuaco, a central rural town in the district of Oyotún. This farming district is two hours away from the city of Chiclayo.

Eduardo has been selling animals for more than fifteen years. He buys and raises the animals and later offers them for sale to merchants who visit the area. Occasionally he will sell his animals at the livestock fair, which takes place once a week in the district of Cayaltí. He relies on these earnings in order to pay for the family expenses.

Eduardo wants to expand his business and increase his sales by purchasing more animals. For this reason, he is requesting his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN to help him accomplish this goal.

Eduardo is an active and enterprising individual. His greatest wish is to gradually grow his business so that he can provide his family a better quality of life. In the area where he lives, he is recognized and respected by his neighbors and friends.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Acquire more animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To provide a business (to purchase rice, beans, etc.)

loans.name: Alexanhder

texts.es:
El señor Alexanhder R. V., tiene la edad de 29 años vive en el populoso barrio las Coneheras, con su esposa y su hijo de un años de edad, se dedica la venta de ropa y pesee una pequeña tienda en donde ofrerta sus productos, su señora se dedica a las actividades del hogar y le apoya en la administración de su negocio, ellos son una familia que comienza a labrar su futuro y que han tenido sufrido robos que afectan la zona y que no le permiten vivir en tranquilidad donde su familia y su negocio se desarrollan, es de esta forma que él espera a futuro asegurar su negocio y hogar para evitar estos problemas que afectan su economía y su vida diaria.
Es para la compra de un mayor inventario de mercadería, que solicita un préstamo y de esta manera aumentar sus niveles de venta y mejorar sus condiciones familiares, y llevar a cabo su planes para la expamncion del negocio y/o proyectos de la familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Alexanhder R. V. is 29 years old and lives in the populous neighborhood Las Coneheras with his wife and their young son. He has dedicated himself to selling clothing and owning a small store to offer his products. His wife is dedicated to the household chores and supports him with the business. Although they have suffered from robberies that affect the neignborhood and don't allow them to live in peace nor develop their business, they are a family that is beginning to build a future. He hopes in the future to insure his business and home to avoid these problems that affect their economic well-being and daily life. He is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise to increase sales, improve their living conditions, and to carry out his business expansion plan and/or family projects.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Reynolds, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase inventory

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una madre D. familia D. 54 años D. edad que vive junto a sus hijas en el sector Los Aguilares, un centro poblado rural del distrito D. Pítipo, un distrito agricola que pertenece a la provincia D. Ferreñafe y que se encuentra ubicado a mas D. 45 minutos D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica desD. hace cinco años a la venta D. comida en un pequeño puesto D. venta ubicado a un lado D. la carretera que une a la ciudad D. Ferreñafe con BatangranD., su puesto está ubicado cerca a un paradero D. mototaxis, sus clientes son los transportistas D. la zona y las personas que acuden D. los caseríos cercanos a tomar el vehículo que los moviliza hacia las ciudades D. Ferreñafe y Chiclayo. 

Su negocio goza D. muy buena acogida debido al tiempo que lleva trabajando en el rubro, a la buena atención que brinda y a la buena sazón con la que prepara sus alimentos. Ella complementa sus ingresos con el negocio D. crianza y venta D. animales menores.

Juana desea adquirir algunos insumos para preparar mas platos D. comida y asi poder aumentar su nivel D. ventas, para lograr su objetivo ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles. Ella es una mujer alegre y tranquila, anteriormente ya ha trabajado con nuestra Institución demostrando puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento D. asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Juana is a 54 year old mother who lives with her daughters in the sector of Los Aguilares, a central rural village in the district of Pítipo. This farming district is part of Ferreñafe Province and located more than 45 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

For five years Juana has been selling food from a small vending stand located besiD. the highway in the city of Ferreñafe con BatangranD.. Her food stand is situated near a motorcycle taxi stop, so her customers are mostly local drivers and their passengers who are traveling to the cities of Ferreñafe and Chiclayo.

Her business has been well-received the entire time it has been in operation, all attributed to the excellent service she provides and the wonderful taste of the dishes that she prepares. She supplements her income by raising and selling small animals.

Juana wants to acquire a few more supplies for preparing her dishes so that she can increase her sales. In order to accomplish this goal, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN. She is a happy and peaceful woman. Juana has worked previously with Edpyme Alternativa and demonstrated promptness and responsibility when completing her payments.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase supplies for her food business

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Maria Auxiliadora tiene 47 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 5 años que sale a vender sus productos, ya se levanta muy temprano a trabajar desde las 5 de la mañana a las 7 de la noche que llega a su humilde vivienda, Maria tiene 1 hijo de 16 años a su cargo ella dio inicio a esta actividad con sus propios ahorros, es que ha logrado establecer este negocio es por eso que solicita este financiamiento para la compra de materia prima como perfumes, cremas, ropa interior, calzado y ropa en general.
texts.en:
Maria Auxiliadora is 47 years old and has been selling general merchandise for more than five years. She wakes up early at 5am to begin her work and then returns to her modest home at 7pm. María has a 16 year old son who is under her care.

She started her business using her own savings and has succeeded in keeping it stable. María is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as perfumes, crèmes, undergarments, shoes, and clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase perfumes, crèmes, undergarments, shoes, and clothing

loans.name: Berta Glasi

texts.es:
Berta tiene 64 años de edad, reside en el municipio de Santa Elena, Departamento de Usulután, vive con una nieta de 15 años de edad y tiene dos hijas ya independientes. Ella tiene una tienda con productos de primera necesidad.
El negocio está ubicado en la casa de habitación, el horario de atención es de 6:00am- 7:00 pm con una experiencia de dos años en  manejar el negocio, los clientes son vecinos y personas que circulan por la zona. Solicita un préstamo para fortalecer el negocio, ella necesita comprar. Aceite, arroz, frijoles,  galletas, embutidos , pollo y jabón. 
Las aspiraciones son tener un negocio fuerte, atraer más clientes, para darle un mejor sistema de vida
texts.en:
Berta is 64 years old, has 2 independent daughters, and lives in the Santa Elena municipality in the Usulután Department with her 15 year old granddaughter. She has a store located in a room in her house where she sells necessities; business hours are from 6:00am- 7:00 pm. She has 2 years of experience managing the business. Her customers are neighbors and people who travel through the area. She is requesting a loan to strengthen her business and purchase oil, rice, beans, cookies, sausages, chicken, and soap. Her aspirations are to have a strong business, attract more customers, and to provide better living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Reynolds, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase oil, rice, beans, cookies, sausages, chicken, and soap

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es: Evelyn tiene 26 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 pequeños hijos en la casa que le fue heredada por sus padres. Hace más de 7 años brinda el servicio de transporte, actividad que lo realiza con su esposo, quien es el conductor de la movilidad que ellos alquilan. De esta manera su esposo recorre los diferentes puntos de la ciudad, siempre teniendo en cuenta la calidad de su servicio, mientras que Evelyn administra los ingresos en que luego serán derivados a los gastos familiares. A su vez, cría vacas y toros en un establo que posee. Ambas actividades lo realiza con mucha dedicación y lo cumple para mejorar la economía de su familia. Evelyn disfruta de su trabajo porque tiene más ingresos y de manera independiente, es por eso que ella y su esposo desean  tener su propio carro para que sus ganancias sean más rentables. Es su décimo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su grupo comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, será destinado al pago del mantenimiento del carro y otra parte en la compra de animales.
texts.en:
Evelyn is 26 years old and lives with her husband and their 2 small children in a house that she inherited from her parents. For more than 7 years, she has provided transportation services, an activity which she carries out with her husband, who drives their rented vehicle. Her husband travels around to the various areas of the city, always taking care to provide quality service, while Evelyn manages the finances and the family's expenses. She also raises cows and bulls in a stable she has. She carries out both activities with great dedication and works hard in order to improve her family's economic situation. Evelyn enjoys her work, because it brings her more income in an independent manner. For this reason, she and her husband would like to have their own car, so that their work will be more profitable. This is her tenth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has a source of financial support, since she has always shown herself to be responsible with her payments. She is also happy to be part of her communal bank, because all of its members are responsible people with a strong sense of solidarity. She would like to thank all of the people who will be involved in providing the loan she is requesting; it will be very useful to her for the progress of her business. She will use the funds from the loan she is requesting to pay for maintenance for the car, and she will also use a portion to buy animals.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Providing maintenance for their rented vehicle, buying animals

loans.name: Harlin Danilo

texts.es:
El Sr. Herlin Danilo Díaz A. es padre  de familia  de tres  hijos  y estos se encuentran en edad escolar.
El préstamo solicitado es para  utilizarlo en la compra de materiales de construcción: cemento, arena y piedra.
Don Danilo dice  que toda la plata  que ha trabajado  con Ceprodel  la ha utilizado en el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación, y ha mejorando su hogar de acuerdo a sus posibilidades de sus ingresos y los prestamos brindados.
texts.en:
Herlin Danilo Díaz A. is a father with three children who are currently of school age. He is requesting a loan to buy construction materials: cement, sand and stone. Danilo says that he has used all of the funds he has received from Ceprodel to improve the house where he lives, and he has improved his home in accordance with the opportunities offered by his income and the loans granted to him.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying construction materials to construct a room in his home

loans.name: Las Rosas Group

texts.es:
Consuelo es casada, tiene 4 hijos, se dedica a la Tejeduría, (Elaboración del Cortes Típicos), tiene 15 años con este negocio. Viendo la necesidad D. ampliar su capital, organizan con otras vecinas un grupo, para poder solicitar un préstamo. 

El Banco Comunal se llama Las Rosas, cuenta con 12 integrantes. La líder del grupo Consuelo utilizara el préstamo para compra D. materia prima, y así podra incrementar las ventas y aumentar las ganancias que será muy beneficioso para ella mejorando sus condiciones D. vida, D. esta forma contribuye al desarrollo D. nuestra sociedad.
texts.en:
Consuelo is married, has four children, and works as a weaver. She has been producing traditional clothing for 15 years. Seeing the need for additional capital, she organized a group with her neighbors so that they could request a loan.

Their Communal Bank is called “Las Rosas” (The Roses) and consists of 12 members. Consuelo is the group leader and will use her loan to buy raw materials. This will enable her to increase her sales and generate more earnings. As a result, she will be able to improve her living conditions and contribute toward the development of society.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operating capital to buy materials

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María Magdalena tiene 41 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a su padre en el sector Huanabal, un centro poblado del área rural del distrito de Mesones Muro, un distrito agrícola perteneciente a la provincia de Ferreñafe, la zona se encuentra ubicada a cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a labores asociadas a la agricultura, ella cría animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive. Con los ingresos que ella percibe de esta actividad solventa sus gastos personales y apoya a su padre en el sostenimiento de la familia.

María desea mejorar la alimentación de sus animales adquiriendo alimento balanceado de modo que puedan desarrollarse de mejor manera, por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer honrada y responsable, anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Nuestra Institución demostrando puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is 41 years of age. She is a single woman and lives with her father in the Huanabal sector, a population center of the rural area of the Mesones Muro district. This is an agricultural district belonging to the province of Ferreñafe. The zone is located forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo. She has been dedicated for ten years to agriculture. She raises small animals in corrals located in the rear of her residence and when they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to her neighbors and to the businessmen that always visit the zone where she lives. With the income that she receives from this activity she settles her personal expenses and helps her father in the support of the family. María desires to improve the diet of her animals acquiring balanced food so that they can develop in a better way. Because of this she has requested a loan of 500 new soles from Edpyme Alternative to help her achieve her objective. She is a responsible and honest woman. She has worked with our institution previously, showing exactness and responsibility in making her payments.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy balanced food for her animals

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
La Sra.  María Teresa T. madre  de familia  de dos  hijos  y estos  se encuentra en edad escolar.
El préstamo solicitado es para  utilizarlo en la compra de materiales de construcción: piso, cemento, arena y mano de obra.
Doña María dice que toda la plata  que ha trabajado  con Ceprodel  la ha utilizado en el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación, y ha mejorando su hogar de acuerdo a sus posibilidades de sus ingresos y los prestamos brindados.
texts.en:
María Teresa T. is the mother of two children who are currently of school age. She is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as flooring, cement, and sand, as well as labor. María says that she has used all of the funds she has received from Ceprodel to improve the house where she lives; she has improved her home in accordance with the opportunities provided by her income and the loans granted to her.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improving her home and replacing the floor

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 44 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos en el caserío Valle Hermoso, un centro poblado de la zona rural del distrito de Monsefú, distrito conocido por sus festividades turísticas y reliosas y por sus trabajos artesanales hechos en arcilla, madera y palmo. Se encuentra ubicado a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores relacionadas a la ganadería desde hace nueve años. El cría ganado vacuno y comercializa la leche que producen a un acopiador de la zona, este negocio le provee de ingresos estables con los cuales sostiene la economía familiar. Adicionalmente trabaja sembrando pastos naturales con los cuales alimenta sus animales.

José desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la producción de sus vacas y también desea realizar algunas mejoras en su establo, para lograr su objetivo ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

José es un padre responsable, su mayor anhelo es dar lo mejor de si para sacar adelante a su familia. Anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Nuestra Institución y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
José is a father, 44-years of age, who lives along with his wife and his two children in the Beautiful Valley settlement, a population center of the rural zone of the district of Monsefú. This district is known for it's tourist and religious festivals and for its native crafts in clay, wood and palm. It is located twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo. José has been dedicated to work related to stockbreeding for nine years. He raises young cattle and markets the milk that they produce to an dairy in the area. This business provides him a stable income with which he maintains the family economy. Additionally he works sowing natural pastures with which he feeds his animals. José desires to acquire balanced food to improve the production of his cows and also he desires to carry out some improvements in his stable. In order to achieve his objective he has requested a loan of 1200 new soles from Edpyme Alternative. José is a responsible father. His greatest wish is to give the best of himself to get his family ahead. He has worked with our institution previously and has shown exactness and responsibility in making his payments.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy balanced food to improve the production of his dairy cows as well as improve his stable.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz joined ASHI in 2005; aiming to get out of the spiral of poverty, and consistently acquire working capital for her "sari-sari" (variety) store and food vending ventures. She has been engaged in these businesses for more than 6 years now. Luz will use this Kiva loan, amounting to PHP 38,000, to buy additional inventory for her sari-sari (variety) store and supply the maintenance of her food vending ventures.

Luz is grateful to ASHI-Kiva for the good heart it shows to the poor, like her family, and really helping them to reach her dreams. That is why Luz has grown to love the institution very much and all the lenders who are sponsoring this loan.

She hopes that one day she will be able to have her own produce stall in the market place for her food vending business, instead of just in her house, and wishes to be able to make enough money to pay for the needs of her family. She also dreams of the best of life for her family that live together.

Luz is seen as older, but she is strong woman of courage who will battle challenges in order to achieve her goals in life. Luz is a caring mother of one daughter.  Luz enjoys considering that the loan from ASHI and Kiva partner will change their lives, provide for her family's needs, and continue to the expansion of her businesses.

loans.use: To buy additional inventory for her sari-sari (variety) store and maintain her food vending business.

loans.name: Edy Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Eddy Antonio C. García es padre  de familia  de seis hijos tres de ellos  se encuentra en edad escolar.
El préstamo solicitado es para  utilizarlo en la compra de medicamento y gasto de la operación de su esposa.
Don Eddy dice  que toda la plata  que ha trabajado  con Ceprodel  la ha utilizado en el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación, y ha mejorando su hogar de acuerdo a sus posibilidades de sus ingresos y los prestamos brindados.
texts.en:
Eddy Antonio C. García is the father of six children, three of whom are of school age. He is requesting a loan to use the funds to buy medications and to pay for an operation for his wife. Eddy says that he has used all of the funds he has received from Ceprodel to improve his house; he has improved his home in accordance with the opportunities provided by his income and the loans offered to him.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying medications and paying for an operation for his wife

loans.name: Blanca Judith

texts.es:
Blanca Judith de 31 años de edad es soltera, habita en el barrio linda Vista de Nueva Guinea,  labora como docente desde hace 12 años en el turno matutino y los fines de semana trabaja en un colegio de computación brindando el servicio de docente. 

Esta solicitando su  9no  credito con el objetivo de repellar  una habitacion y comprar zinc y de esta manera mejorar sus condiciones de vida.  

Expresa sentirse muy agradecida con AFODENIC por el apoyo que se le ha brindado, pues gracias a los creditos concedidos ha podido ir mejorando su casa poco a poco.  El mayor sueño que tiene es poder su casita con las condiciones necesarias para vivir comodamente.
texts.en:
Blanca Judith is 31 years old and single. She lives in the scenic neighborhood of Vista de Nueva Guinea. For the past 12 years, she has worked as a teacher during the morning shift. On weekends, she works in a mathematics school providing teaching services. She is requesting her 9th loan with the goal of plastering a room in her home and buying corrugated metal sheets, which will help improve her standard of living. She reports that she feels very grateful to AFODENIC for the support provided to her, since thanks to the loans offered to her, she has been able to improve her home little by little. Her greatest dream is to equip her little house with the necessary conditions so that she can live comfortably.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Plastering a room and buying metal sheets.

loans.name: Vimely

texts.en:
Vimely A. is from the village of Yahong, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is 37 years old and is married with two school-aged children. Vimely owns and operates a business providing motorcycle transport services. She has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 4,500 PHP a month. In 2005, Vimely joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10,000 PHP from GDMPC. Vimely is requesting a new loan of 18,000 PHP which will be used to repair her existing vehicle in order to provide better service. This loan will be her third from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. About GDMPC: GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three unit offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To repair her existing vehicle in order to provide better service

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es:
El Sr. José Andrés R. es padre  de familia  de un niño de siete años  y este  se encuentra en edad escolar.
El préstamo solicitado es para  utilizarlo en la compra de materiales de construcción: cemento, arena y zinc para su casa de habitación y gastos de medicamentos para uno de sus hijos.
Don José R. dice  que toda la plata  que ha trabajado  con Ceprodel  la ha utilizado en el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación, y ha mejorando su hogar de acuerdo a sus posibilidades de sus ingresos y los prestamos brindados.
texts.en:
José Andrés R. is the father of a seven-year-old child who is of school age. The requested loan is to be used for the purchase of construction materials like cement, sand and zinc for his house, and to cover the cost of medication for one of his children. Don José R. says that he has used all the money he has borrowed from Ceprodel to improve his house, and he has improved it in line with his income and the loans granted him.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Home improvement and family expenses

loans.name: Dalila

texts.es:
Dalila es una madre de familia de 36 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y a su hijo en el sector El Sandial, una centro poblado rural del distrito de Pítipo, un distrito agrícola de la provincia de Ferreñafe, se encuentra ubicado a hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza de animales menores desde hace cuatro años en su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y a los negociantes que siempre visitan el lugar en done vive. Ella alimenta a sus animales con alimento concentrado y forraje, el cual es sembrado por su esposo, de este modo ambos garantizan el rapido crecimiento de sus animales, lo que les permite comercializarlos de mejor manera y percibir mayores ganancias.

Dalila desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de ovejas con las cuales piensa trabajar del mismo modo: engordándolas y vendiéndolas en la misma zona, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a EdpymeAlternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

Con el préstamo ella podrá ampliar su negocio y nivel de ventas, asimismo la calidad de vida de su familia aumentará. Dalila es una mujer trabajadora y entregada a su familia.
texts.en:
Delilah is a 36-year-old mother that lives along with her husband and son in the Sandial sector, a rural population center of the district of Pítipo. This is an agricultural district of the province of Ferreñafe, which is located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo. Delilah has been dedicated to breeding smaller animals for four years in her residence. When they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to her neighbors and to the businessmen that always visit the place where she lives. She feeds her animals with concentrated food and fodder, which is sown by her husband. In this way both guarantee the rapid growth of her animals, which permits them to market them in a better way and to receive greater profits. Delilah desires to expand her business with the purchase of sheep with which she plans to work in the same way: fattening and selling them in the same zone. To achieve her objective she has seen he need for the first time to request a loan of 500 new soles from EdpymeAlternativa. With the loan she will be able to expand her business and her level of sales, and likewise the quality of life of her family. Delilah is a hard-working woman and devoted to her family.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Regina Mardeli

texts.es:
Regina es una madre de familia de 29 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y a sus dos hijos menores de edad en el sector El Sandial, una centro poblado rural del distrito de Pítipo, un distrito agrícola de la provincia de Ferreñafe, se encuentra ubicado a hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza de animales menores desde hace cuatro años en su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y a los negociantes que siempre visitan el lugar en done vive.
